courses.title: Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming
courses.description: Introduction to programming in an object-oriented language. Topics typically include variables, control structures, methods, arrays, objects, and basic software development practices.

courses.title: Data Structures
courses.description: Study of data structures and their implementation and use in software. Topics typically include lists, stacks, queues, trees, hashing, and algorithm analysis.

courses.title: Applied Calculus I
courses.description: Differential calculus with applications. (Exact coverage varies by program.)
